statements: DELETE FROM customer_segments WHERE age < 30 AND gender = 'Male';
DELETE FROM customer_segments WHERE customer_id = 101 AND age < 30;
DELETE FROM customer_segments WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_age_start = 18 OR target_gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM demographics WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customers WHERE age > 30);
